text: Discussion: Massachusetts Senate and House Primaries - 9/1/2020

Hi, we’re Tia Mitchell and Mark Niesse, reporters for The Atlanta Journal-Constitution covering Georgia’s elections. We’re here to answer questions about hot races and voting in November’s election. AMA!
